foreignData.name: Geißelwolf
foreignData.text:
Erstschlag
Delirium — Der Geißelwolf hat Doppelschlag, solange dein Friedhof vier oder mehr unterschiedliche Kartentypen enthält.

foreignData.name: Lobo azote
foreignData.text:
Daña primero.
Delirio — El Lobo azote tiene la habilidad de dañar dos veces mientras entre las cartas de tu cementerio haya cuatro o más tipos de cartas.

foreignData.name: Loup du fléau
foreignData.text:
Initiative
Délire — Le Loup du fléau a la double initiative tant qu'il y a au moins quatre types de carte parmi les cartes de votre cimetière.

foreignData.name: Lupo della Piaga
foreignData.text:
Attacco improvviso
Delirio — Il Lupo della Piaga ha doppio attacco fintanto che ci sono quattro o più tipi di carta tra le carte nel tuo cimitero.

foreignData.name: 災いの狼
foreignData.text:
先制攻撃
昂揚 ― あなたの墓地にあるカードにカード・タイプが合計４種類以上含まれるかぎり、災いの狼は二段攻撃を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 狼・ホラー

foreignData.name: 재앙의 늑대
foreignData.text:
선제공격
섬망 — 당신의 무덤에 네 개 이상의 카드 유형이 있는 한, 재앙의 늑대는 이단공격을 가진다.

foreignData.name: Lobo do Flagelo
foreignData.text:
Iniciativa
Delírio — Lobo do Flagelo terá golpe duplo enquanto houver quatro ou mais tipos de card entre os cards de seu cemitério.

foreignData.name: Беспощадный Волк
foreignData.text:
Первый удар
Буйство — Беспощадный Волк имеет Двойной удар, пока среди карт на вашем кладбище есть не менее четырех типов карт.

foreignData.name: 祸害狼
foreignData.text:
先攻
躁狂～只要你坟墓场中牌的类别有四种或更多，祸害狼便具有连击异能。

foreignData.name: 禍害狼
foreignData.text:
先攻
躁狂～只要你墳墓場中牌的類別有四種或更多，禍害狼便具有連擊異能。

name: Scourge Wolf
originalText:
First strike
Delirium — Scourge Wolf has double strike as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

text:
First strike
Delirium — Scourge Wolf has double strike as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
